Summary: looks like twinkling stars with multiple flashing lights
divs: Sighting DetailsWalked outside and saw a bright orange light or orb about a mile away from me the size is unknown. The light disappeared after a few seconds then re appeared then was gone. A that time we observed multiple flashing lights in different colors all over the sky. Could hear substantial military activity at that time. Flasing lights moved fast. The lights seemed to be communicating with each other. Have continued to stay in the area. Its very cool and exciting to watch.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Vernon
There were no other sightings in North Vernon on or around December 12th 2012
